Name: Bad-Draw
About the game: The unloved is erased, but the cultivated remains. Here are the old ones full of hate and these hate books. A long time passes, it increases so much that they start to control and our character is born with stubborn ambition. This is a 2D platform game with competitive bosses and parkour mechanics. Defeating bosses gives the character new skills or mechanics.
